name: Root Mansion
description:
GGJ 2023 entry. Help the Azure Dragon of the East deal with his pesky upside neighbors who never stop partying with nature magic creating plants that are destroying his apartment.

Controls Keyboard Directional Arrows
Move character
Space bar
Pass story, JumpEFix furniture
EscapePause Controller Left analogMove characterAStart, Pass story, Jump
XFix furniture
StartPause Credits ArtDaniel M.
Giovana GasperinProgrammingAphek G. de Brito
Leonardo N. Bergamini
Paulo F.

Background music is "The Crossfaders - Sonare", licensed under CC-by-nc-sa. Obtained from http://starquakerecords.weebly.com/star-cake-compilation---2nd-candle.html

Some sound effects were obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Other sound effects from https://writingduels.itch.io/old-man-character-sound-effects
